about_the_game:
Welcome to Island Designer, where your vision shapes the paradise of tomorrow!

In Island Designer, you embark on a unique journey as an island renovation expert. Your mission is simple yet challenging: transform uninhabited islands into bespoke paradises, tailored to the dreams of your diverse clientele. With a mix of strategic planning, design flair, and business acumen, can you become the ultimate island architect?

Gameplay Features:

Unique Clientele with Diverse Preferences: Each client comes with their own set of dreams, preferences, and budgets. From secluded retreats for the solitude-seeking writer to bustling resorts for the social butterfly, your task is to fulfill these dreams within their budget.
Island Acquisition and Renovation: Scour the market for the perfect island that meets your client's vision. Negotiate and purchase the land, then take your tools and creativity to transform it into a piece of paradise. Adjust the elevation, manipulate the vegetation, and place buildings and props to create the ideal layout.
Design Freedom: Elevate or lower the land to create stunning viewpoints or cozy valleys. Add lush forests, tranquil beaches, or exotic gardens. Select from a wide range of buildings and props to decorate your island. Your design choices directly impact your client’s satisfaction and your reputation.
Economic Strategy: Manage your finances wisely. Buying low, selling high, and keeping renovation costs under control are key to your business’s success. Each satisfied client not only boosts your reputation but also your bank balance, allowing for even grander projects.
Progress and Unlockables: Successful projects unlock new islands, more demanding clients, and a broader array of architectural and natural elements. Grow from a modest designer to the most sought-after island architect in the world.
Dynamic World: Each island is a blank canvas with its own potential. The dynamic environment responds to your design choices, creating a living, breathing world.
Become the architect of dreams in Island Designer. Where will your vision take you?

Features:

Engaging sandbox gameplay with strategic elements.
Diverse clients with unique needs and budgets.
Dynamic island environments that respond to your design choices.
Wide selection of vegetation, buildings, and props for customization.
Economic strategy for buying, renovating, and selling islands.
Progression system that unlocks new content as you grow your reputation.

Island Designer is not just a game; it’s a journey to the corners of your creativity. Ready to craft the paradises of tomorrow?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Island Designer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Vega 8
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Turn islands into dream paradises in Island Designer! Buy, design, and sell unique retreats to satisfy clients, build your reputation, and unlock new challenges. Your vision is their paradise.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Bangla*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Catalan*, Cherokee*, Croatian*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Icelandic*, Igbo*, Irish*, K'iche'*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Konkani*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Persian*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Quechua*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Urdu*, Uyghur*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Xhosa*, Yoruba*, Zulu*
*languages with full audio support
